message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. Considering its exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $2000000. I look forward to your response.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $2000000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $1500000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
